original_text:
Let us come into his presence with thanksgiving;
    let us make a joyful noise to him with songs of praise!
korean_text: 우리가 감사함으로 그 앞에 나아가며 시를 지어 즐거이 그를 노래하자

sentences.original_text: Let us come into his presence with thanksgiving
let us make a joyful noise to him with songs of praise!
sentences.korean_translation: 찬양의 노래로 그에게 기쁜 소리를 드리자
